third: How did I end up in the desert?
fourth: Mmm... I will not accept the gift and ask you not to give anything.
I will accept the gift, how can I refuse it, it's rude!
fifth: It's a strange question, but I think so.
How can you ask such a thing!
sixth: The hell with it! Life is unfair.
seventh: I don't have a best friend.
Aah... no! I don't have a best friend.
eighth: I don't remember much, but it looks like a teddy bear.
Probably... probably... A typewriter, yes, a yellow typewriter!
